paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 variant T298I/V299L/V300R, including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: We cross-validated the fold-change in affinity for the binding of the MAP1LC3B ATG8 domain to wild-type/mutant (T298I/V299L/V300R) BRCA2292-307 peptide by isothermal titration calorimetry.

functional_data.summary: The binding effect of the BRCA2 variant was validated by isothermal titration calorimetry, confirming higher affinity for the mutant peptide.

variants.additional_notes: The variant was part of a study assessing the impact of mutations on protein interactions.
key_quotes: We cross-validated the fold-change in affinity for the binding of the MAP1LC3B ATG8 domain to wild-type/mutant (T298I/V299L/V300R) BRCA2292-307 peptide by isothermal titration calorimetry.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data was clear and specific to the BRCA2 variant.
